Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class YellowMarble

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Marble
it.polimi.ingsw.model.YellowMarble
public class YellowMarble
extends Marble
This class represents a specific type of Marble, the YellowMarble. It is a singleton.

    • action

      public int action​(java.lang.String chosen, java.util.ArrayList<ResourceAmount> deposits, FaithMarker faith, java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaders, Color chosenColor) throws InvalidActionException
      This method defines the action performed by a YellowMarble. It tries to put a Coin in the chosen deposit. If this can't be done, the resource is discarded (return 1) or an exception is thrown.
      Specified by:
      action in class Marble
      Parameters:
      chosen - : a String representing the deposit chosen by the client in which to put the resource
      deposits - : a List of all the deposits of the player
      faith - : the FaithMarker of the player
      leaders - : the leaders of the player
      chosenColor - : used in case a player has two active leaders that change the value of the white marble: the user needs to choose which color he wants
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Simple method used in tests
      Specified by:
      toString in class Marble
      Returns:
      a String representation of the Marble
